title: Add a sensor for my hometown
description: Hello! I'd like you to add a sensor for my hometown Comacchio. Best regards.

title: Add feature
description: Hi! I would really like for the website to have a weather prediction feature so that I know if I should take my umbrella with me when I go out. Thanks.

title: Add Rimini
description: Can you add Rimini as a location so I know if it's hot enough for a day at the beach?
